article_title: No, You Can't Keep Your Drugs Either Under Obamacare

article_metadata.description: The President famously promised that you could keep your health plan and doctor. For many people, both of those pledges are turning out to be false. And now, you might not be able to keep your medicine, either. There are two reasons why. The first has to do with the higher [...]
article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb
